queryName: Security context deny admission control plugin not set
descriptionText: For `kube-apiserver`, the `--enable-admission-plugins` flag should include `SecurityContextDeny` when `PodSecurityPolicy` is not set. The `SecurityContextDeny` plugin must also be configured in the admission control configuration file. This ensures pod security constraints remain enforced when `PodSecurityPolicy` is disabled. The rule checks both `containers` and `initContainers` command lines for the presence of the flag and plugin.
